home.hero_sub: Well-maintained cars, fair prices, fast pickup.
home.trust_copy: Transparent pricing, modern fleet, and friendly service in Tangier.
home.testimonial_1: “Smooth pickup at the airport and great price.”
fleet.title: Our Fleet
fleet.intro: Choose the right car category for your trip.
pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.intro: Daily and weekly rates. Insurance and basic mileage included.
pricing.note: Final price shown during booking based on your dates and options.
booking.title: Book Your Car
booking.confirm_copy: Thank you. Your request has been received. We will contact you to finalize details.
contact.title: Contact
about.title: About INITIALE AUTO RENT
about.copy_1: We are a Tangier-based rental company focused on reliability, clear pricing, and fast pickup. Our team maintains a modern fleet so you can travel with confidence.
about.copy_2: We serve airport, city center, and hotel pickups with WhatsApp support to coordinate your trip.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.
privacy.collect_copy: Contact details (name, email, phone), booking details (dates, vehicle preferences), and communications (messages, calls) you send us.
privacy.purpose_copy: To process bookings, provide support, improve services, and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.legal_copy: Contract performance, legitimate interests, and consent where required.
privacy.retention_copy: We keep data only as long as necessary for the purposes above and to comply with applicable laws.
privacy.sharing_copy: We do not sell your data. We may share with payment, IT, or insurance providers strictly for service delivery and legal compliance.
privacy.rights_copy: You can request access, correction, deletion, or restriction of your data. You may also object to processing where applicable.
privacy.contact_copy: To exercise rights or ask questions, contact us via the details on the Contact page.
